name: Overthrow of the Goat
description:
Made for TOJam #10 - Tentacular!

Overthrow the castle in this two-player hack'n'slash game!

Use controllers or keys. WASD + LCtrl for player 1, arrows + RCtrl for player 2. Time your sword slashin' with the power meter to do a fancy spin move.

Pardon the bugs, but it's a game jam!

Marcus Kamps - code + art
Nick Komarnicki - sound
Aaron McLeod - code + art
Edward Montenegro - art
John Montenegro - art
